content:
Hi,
I am trying to setup a FHIR Server using HAPI JPA, I have setup the server using Derby and in the process of configuring using MySql.
I would like to get some help on the following;
Modify the Capability Statement and update logic to support specific resources conforming to a profile/IG (e.g DaVinci, Arganut) and load my custom terminology systems. Eventually I would like to update the UI and deploy it.
Can you point me to relevant sections of the code/jars to modify.

Appreciate any help
Thanks
